column4: I have 191836 total mem, but my swap is 514040. Is the swap too big?
Well, why would the Ubuntu site say that 128MB was cool for min req if it really isn't?
What should I do? Try to install again?
of course, but I'm in college. RAM for this old laptop is expeensive.......
I was using Windows. It was slow, but at least it worked...
what seems to be the problem ?
what is the name of your machine ?
somehing is eating my memory and preventing ubuntu from loading past the user/pass screen.
can you log into the machine from the console ?
what are you trying to do ? read the file ~/.xsession-errors
do you see many errors in ~/.xsession-errors ?
is it possible your disk is full ?
